message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you our top-of-the-line product. It's a unique opportunity to own a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value.

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I understand that $1200000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $1600000. This is a very competitive price, and I think you'll find it's a great value.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $1200000. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $1400000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and our previous discussions.

I understand that you're still a bit hesitant, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1400000. I can offer you a slight concession, but I need to get closer to my target price. I can offer it to you for $1800000. This is still a great deal, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny.

I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $1600000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and our previous discussions.

I understand that you're still a bit hesitant, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1600000. I'm starting to think that we're getting close to the product's true value, but I need to get closer to my target price. I can offer it to you for $2000000. This is a firm price, and I'm not willing to go any lower.

I understand that you're firm on your price, Alice, but I'm still not willing to go that high. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $1800000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and our previous discussions. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I may need to reconsider my options.

I understand that you're still trying to negotiate, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $2000000. However, I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I'll include a 5-year warranty and a complimentary maintenance package, which is a $200000 value. This is a one-time offer, and I think it's a great opportunity for you to get the product at a price that's still a great value. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1800000, but only if you accept the extras.

I appreciate the extras you're offering, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'd like to make a final counteroffer of $1700000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and the extras you're offering. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll need to consider other options.
